name: auto-refresher
description: A jQuery plugin to auto-refresh a page, with a visual progress bar.

scripts.makedir:all: npm run makedir:only:css && npm run makedir:only:js
scripts.clean:only:js: npm run removedir:only:js && npm run makedir:only:js
scripts.clean:only:css: npm run removedir:only:css && npm run makedir:only:css
scripts.clean:all: npm run removedir:all && npm run makedir:all
scripts.rebuild:only:css: npm run clean:only:css && npm run build:only:js
scripts.rebuild:only:js: npm run clean:only:js && npm run build:only:js
scripts.rebuild:all: npm run clean:all && npm run build:all
scripts.build:only:js: npm run lint:js && npm run build:js:expanded && npm run build:js:min
scripts.build:only:css: npm run lint:scss && npm run build:css:expanded && npm run build:css:min
scripts.build:all: npm run build:only:css && npm run build:only:js
